channel.title: How can i add crowns?
channel.description: I recently downloaded a source + client, but it doesn't have any crown's..How can I add crown's for Donator, Modator, Administrator, Co-Owner and Owner. The player right's work's but there isn't any crown's. I also don't know what cache it is...? Help please.!

item.title: How can i add crowns?
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

For my crowns they are in the Player folder in my Sprites.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add crowns?
item.dc:creator: @run3scap3_uk run3scap3_uk
item.description:
@run3scap3_uk wrote:

I recently downloaded a source + client, but it doesn’t have any crown’s…How can I add crown’s for Donator, Modator, Administrator, Co-Owner and Owner.
The player right’s work’s but there isn’t any crown’s. I also don’t know what cache it is…? Help please.!
